categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This individual was a member of the Jedi Order who took on Jape as a Padawan. Jape's Master was specialized in astrophysics, and when he wasn't in the Grand Orbital Observatory of Coruscant, Jape was often taken around the galaxy by his Master to observe phenomena such as black holes and nebulae.
